product_name: DeFeet Woolie Boolie Bike Socks - Men's
long_description: These Woolie Boolie socks from DeFeet offer the comfort and performance of wool in a design that works for just about any activity, whether you're going for a run or ride or relaxing on a lazy Sunday. Constructed of lightweight, soft merino wool for enhanced moisture-wicking performance and itch-free comfort; nylon adds durability. Touch of Lycra(R) spandex helps socks keep their shape and stretch to move with you. Mesh weave on top of socks and insteps allows feet to breathe and helps them stay dry. Full-length padding provides a stable, cushioning platform for all-around performance. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: These Woolie Boolie socks from DeFeet offer the comfort and performance of wool in a design that works for just about any activity, whether you're going for a run or ride or relaxing on a lazy Sunday.
